Ph2tp

class dtpr.particles.ph2tp.Ph2tp(itp, ev=None, wh=None, sc=None, st=None, phi=None, phiB=None, BX=None, quality=None, rpcFlag=None)[source]
BX
__init__(itp, ev=None, wh=None, sc=None, st=None, phi=None, phiB=None, BX=None, quality=None, rpcFlag=None)[source]

Initialize a Phase2 Trigger Primitive (Ph2tp) instance.

A Phase2 Trigger Primitive can be initialized either by providing the root event entry (ev) or by passing each parameter individually.

Parameters:

  • itp (int) – The index of the trigger primitive.

  • ev – The root event object containing event data.

  • wh (int, optional) – The wheel number.

  • sc (int, optional) – The sector number.

  • st (int, optional) – The station number.

  • phi (float, optional) – The phi position.

  • phiB (float, optional) – The phi bending angle.

  • BX (int, optional) – The bunch crossing number.

  • quality (int, optional) – The quality of the trigger primitive.

  • rpcFlag (int, optional) – The RPC flag.

__str__(indentLevel=0)[source]

Generate a string representation of the Phase2 Trigger Primitive (Ph2tp) instance.

Parameters:

indentLevel (int) – The indentation level for the summary.

Returns:

The trigger primitive summary.

Return type:

str
